001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.modules.deserializers;
003
004import java.io.IOException;
005import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
006
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationContext;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.deser.std.StdScalarDeserializer;
010
011public class ZonedDateTimeDeserializer extends StdScalarDeserializer<ZonedDateTime> {
012
013    private static final long serialVersionUID = 0L;
014
015    public ZonedDateTimeDeserializer() {
016        super(ZonedDateTime.class);
017    }
018
019    @Override
020    public ZonedDateTime deserialize(final JsonParser jsonParser, final DeserializationContext deserializationContext)
021            throws IOException {
022        return ZonedDateTime.parse(jsonParser.getText());
023    }
024}
